website_summaries.verdict: Good for use in the shower, but only rated as IPX4, which is resistant against splashes of water.
pros: Rechargeable battery offers up to six hours of play time at average volume
Suction cup and hook make it easy to bring with you
Built-in mic helps you answer phone calls if you wish

website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, water-resistant speaker that you can leave in the shower or take with you wherever you go.
pros: Comes with clip for hanging the speaker and suction cup for attaching to shower wall
Bluetooth speaker with hands-free calling option
cons: Some complaints that speaker stops taking a charge after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Its also perfect in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Im going to be honest with you all...It does the job, Its not that loud but its loud enough, You know? I carry this on every photoshoot and really changes the vibe for myself and the model. Its also perfect in the shower. I hang it on shower curtains hooks for a better echo and yes that my beer there. It beeps when it volume is reached to highest and lowest. Get it, trust me :)
customer_reviews.author: The Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use in the shower so I can listen to some bops! The quality of the speaker and battery life are amazing. I usually don’t have to charge it for a while! Definitely would recommend this speaker to a friend or someone you know with good music taste!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Great for listening to music while ins the shower. Dropped it in water a couple times and still works great. And the water comes right out when you hold the volume on max.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: 2-27-17 I bought two of these, one for house and one for the car. They work great, I would give them a 5-star except I don't like the volume up/next buttons. Sound is great and I can hear better in the car (old car) using the Bluetooth option. My test speaker is going over 6 hours of play time so far and my phone can be in the kitchen and the speaker in the basement and stay connected. (32 feet) Suction cup works well on shower wall and window.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It works!....is all i have to say...only irk is that the volume could definitely be louder...just find somewhere that is central or close to where you are gonna be in the house. Our apartment is on the smaller side so it functions fine, I cannot imagine it being effective in a large house.
customer_reviews.author: TonyD

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase, very happy
customer_reviews.text: The VicTsing Shower Speaker connected easily to our iPhone 6s Plus. The volume is great, you can pause, go to the next song and take a phone call on the speaker if you need to. It does not feel or sound cheap. The suction cup is strong and more than this device needs to secure it to the shower wall. I am very happy with the purchase and will enjoy not getting my phone wet to change a song in the shower and having the device a bit louder (than the phone sounds on its own).
customer_reviews.author: Happy :-)

customer_reviews.title: Received it on Wednesday. On Thursday I put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it on Wednesday. On Thursday I put it in my shower on the edge so it would stay dry while i listened to podcasts. By Friday it was broken with it able to hold a charge for all of 1 minute, not turning on at all, and I think the button for the power was always damaged as the three other buttons i hear and feel a click when I press them, but the power button makes no click and no indication that something has been pressed
customer_reviews.author: Jake Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could speak to how well the speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could speak to how well the speaker sounds and works but I can’t. I charge it overnight, and when I go to use it the next evening, it’s dead. I’ve never been able to get it to stay powered on long enough to pair it or use it. Edit: the seller sent me a replacement speaker, but it had the same issue. Worried it was user error, I had both my husband and friend - both highly intelligent individuals - and neither one could get either of the speakers to work at all.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Long Battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys ever! I’ve only charged it once! Easy to use, light and the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Silver

customer_reviews.title: Does not work - Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work. Although the receiver will ring when manually pressed to change the tone/volume, and the push button on the actual doorbell lights up when pressed, they don’t talk to each other at all (even when directly next to eachother). So pushing the doorbell does nothing. This is just useless. Short return window closed before I even opened the box. I’d avoid this waste of money at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Brody

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you understand it lasts about a year only.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and used as directed. One was for my daughter. We loved them in every way. BUT the place where you put in the charger on both of them did exactly the same thing. They suddenly did not work at all. No way to charge them. We don’t live in the same house or use each other’s device. I cannot believe I have two of these that have great sound and and in perfect condition and look brand new and will not charge with the original charger because of a faulty design with the port.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Shook

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs and People
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our travel trailer. I love it! Now my dogs do not go crazy from door knocking. I set it on a soft bird chirping ring and they no longer bark when people ring our doorbell! I mounted it on a piece of decorative wood and hang it outside the door. This way I can take it inside when we travel so it will not get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Working fine, very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine in our small home. Can set volume level as well as select the type of "door bell" or music you wish. Many choices of the sound you want it to make. I did need to refer to the instructions in order to change the "tune" since it is not real intuitive how to do this. Instructions easy to follow. Would buy again. Update - I did buy another one. Would give it 4.5 stars. Only problem is setting the ringtone to what we want. Difficult to get it to work as instructed. Still pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Item was not easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Item was not easy to program. Once programmed it was impossible to change ringer song collections. Would revert back to first song selection and not hold onto new one. Am returning this for refund and have already purchased a hopefully better product from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Utell

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Save your $$. I bought this in Sept. 2017 and it quit working in less than 5 months. I changed the battery and it still won't work. What a piece of junk. 3/18. This product failed after the return window had closed, so I didn't contact the seller. To my surprise, after I posted the above review, the seller contacted me and offered to replace the item, which I agreed to and they did. So, that is in their favor. I've installed the new doorbell and we will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Dominopersson

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY LIFE IS DEFINITELY QUESTIONABLE
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product was amazing-- and I was so excited to receive it so quickly! It was incredibly simply to install, once I had it fully charged. While I like a lot of bass, I found the sound quality as expected for a small speaker that is waterproof! No complaints there... Unfortunately, the battery life definitely fell short of my expectations-- and that's an understatement! I turned it off after the first time I used it, and the very next day it wouldn't turn on.... the battery was dead. The customer service was super, as I received the credit as soon as the product was picked up!
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Not Loud Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bright this to use on my classroom as an attention caller to students. Either my students are very loud or the doorbell sound is not that good. I say the latter if the two. The doorbell sound is to faint for a classroom setting. The proximity of the doorbell to the chime is disconcerting considering I can by always have the two parts near each other.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect door bell. I used to have a bulky battery operated one that almost never worked. This one took me 2 minutes to install and that's only because there are so many sounds/songs to choose from, including holiday songs, classical songs, chimes, etc. It is also very small. Love it! I'm glad I won't be missing any deliveries now.
customer_reviews.author: SAA

customer_reviews.title: Failed after two days of use
customer_reviews.text: After two days of use this product began to malfunction. (Of course, after I threw away the packaging.) I was unable to turn it off and it continued, for two hours, to say "power on, pairing" until the batteries finally ran out. Not I can't get it to stay on when I press the power button. It didn't take any abuse, and the charging port was always closed when around water. Very disappointed in this product that came highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome just ask me for help if you want setting it up.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I love this . i had some difficulty setting it up because there is no clear directions n the box I'm giving one to my brother as a birthday gift and I'm going have to slowly walk him thru with his phone here before he leaves with it. Im glad i have a little not a lot a phone knowledge( it wasnt until about 6 months ago that i learned how to take screen shots. So if anyone gets this its great btw. Just ask and i will be happy to tey to help you.😉
customer_reviews.author: Amie Sheaff

customer_reviews.title: Works Great & Simple!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my previous wireless doorbell with this one and it's so much better. The one I had purchased at Home Depot did not compare. The hub with the chime was battery operated, not plug-in like this one. The connection between the bell and chime was constantly being lost or delayed (sometimes hours) despite fresh batteries. This unit has so many chimes to choose from and four different volume setting. I think it cost even less than the one I had purchased! I highly recommend this as a simple, perfect, inexpensive solution if you're looking for a doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Poeit1

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT sounding waterproof speaker that can be used equally in both wet OR dry environments. In my limited experience I have found that the very act of "waterproofing" tends to muffle any speaker,no matter the quality,because waterproofing means sealing the entire system to keep things out. The sealing process also keeps things inside the seal from getting out, muting the sound. However this system, at least to me, doesn't seem to have that issue. I like this Waterproof Bluetooth speaker very much, you might like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Old Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice doorbell
customer_reviews.text: My doorbell went out about 5 years ago, and we just never replaced it, my husband was looking on Amazon one day and ran up on this doorbell,he was impressed with all the reviews, so he ordered it, you can’t beat the price we paid for it, it’s works beautifully , I would recommend this doorbell to anyone who’s looking to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Stuck door bell piece out front...and plug the received into an outlet in the middle of the house. It is a great volume and tone. It sounds so real it’s hard to explain. It rings twice inside with a single push at the door...almost making sure you hear it fri. The back of the house. Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.author: EscapeTheSpace

customer_reviews.title: Battery is terrible, sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is no where near their claim of 4-6 hrs. I only use it a few times a week in the shower and the stupid low battery beeping starts going off after about a week and a half. I dont use it every time I take a shower so figure it may be used 6-7 times for a total of maybe 2 hrs playback time before low battery beeping starts. Only reason for two stars and not one is because the sound is good. Get what you pay for I guess but dont let them fool you with their battery life claim.
customer_reviews.author: txsig

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on May 21st, 2017. Speaker sounded great, but quit taking a charge in late November. I contacted the seller and explained the issue. They responded quickly saying I should try a different cable/charger. I then tried 3 different cables/chargers with the same result. The battery won't take a charge. I've been waiting over 2 weeks since informing them the cables/chargers did not fix the issue and have received no response. Not impressed with the warranty protocol at this point. UPDATE: Seller apologized for the delayed response and has since sent me another working model.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Ann

customer_reviews.title: Finally! One that works
customer_reviews.text: We've had 2 other wireless doorbells (Not from Amazon) that failed shortly after purchase. This one has been great so far. Easy to set up and loud enough to hear from anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does not play well with Google Maps
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fine for listening to tunes/podcasts in the shower. If you want to take it on the road, however, might not have the best experience. When I tried using both Stitcher & Google Maps, Stitcher was fine until Maps gave me directions. Afterward I could barely hear Stitcher! Had to close both apps/turn bluetooth off/on. Also, it clipped the first word, or couple of syllables from each direction. If I'd been relying on voice alone, I never would have got to my location! Could be b/c I have an older model Android... <shrug> YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Victoria

customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product as a shower speaker since I got it in February 2016. I am amazed by it's longevity in dealing with bathroom humidity as well as holding a charge. It makes no sense to me, but its almost like the battery has gotten BETTER as it has aged. It's also loud enough that I can listen to and understand podcast talkers over a running shower and a bathroom fan or heater. For the price, you'd seriously be hard pressed to find a better speaker.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Brings singing in the shower to another level!
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups right to the shower wall. Works perfect for playing music. Also I love how I can answer calls in the shower on it too! So much easier then trying to dry your hands and fumble to find your phone when you are soaking wet. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Turman

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review- After reading my review customer service got in touch with me and sent me a new speaker. The carabiner on the new speaker that was sent to me already feels like higher quality. Great customer service. Thanks again! I ordered this speaker because I wanted something lightweight and water resistant and it’s good for the price. The carabiner it came with broke the same day of me testing it out very poor quality but I have better ones so I just switched it out. The battery life is not the best but it works for a few hours which is all I need it for. It’s not the best speaker out there but it’s also not the worse.
customer_reviews.author: Danmarie

customer_reviews.title: Too short of battery life
customer_reviews.text: I only charge it with the designated cord it arrived with. Noticed right away a short battery life. Well, I’ve had it a few weeks now. Freshly charged it ran about 20 to 30 minutes before the annoying “hey battery is getting low” beeping started. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MR. REALITY

customer_reviews.title: The replacement to the original died as well...
customer_reviews.text: A month into using this product it stopped holding a charge. It now beeps about every ten seconds so I can't even use it when it's plugged in, let alone as a shower speaker. Because it crapped out two days after the return date it's going in the garbage. Revised(again): As I said above, the original speaker didn't last a month but the seller acted quickly to replace it which was impressive and appreciated. The replacement speaker was working quite well until recently when it stopped taking a charge. The charge light illuminates for a few seconds and then goes out. Unplugging and replugging produces the same results. Speaker no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to install. I just plugged in the receiver, paired the devices, and mounted the doorbell with a command strip (included). There are so many chimes to go through that it can be a little overwhelming, but I landed on one that sounds a bit like "Hey Jude" that was the tenth option in. It's loud enough to be heard from anywhere in my (admittedly small) home. I'm thinking about buying a second doorbell for my back door.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Controls problems
customer_reviews.text: This device works ok, but I have 2 problems. First, the control buttons are not marked well enough for me to see which is which except in very bright light. So, which button is power, which button advances the track, etc. Second, the same button is used to advance the track and to change the sound level. However, I have never been able to change the sound level; every time I push the button--at either end--the track changes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Worse speaker don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worse speaker I’ve ever purchased. Battery lasts no more than 30 min before it starts to interrupt your music and dings an annoying double ding to get you to charge it but it literally cuts off part of your song while it does that. The sound sucks and volume is limited. Best thing about it is the suction cup hold but that didn’t even work in the bathroom like the reviews mentioned it was good for. Too much time and extra $$ to return. Still sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, Limited Surface Compatibility, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with the speaker at all. It sounds good to include the bass. It will not stick to my shower surround but does stick to the shower door. Not ideal but it works. Battery seems to last a long time between charges. Alice in customer service turned over every stone trying to resolve this to my satisfaction. Customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Good product with great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker for my husband who loves to listen to podcasts while he showers. He used to put his phone in the corner of the shower on a ledge and it gave me anxiety thinking it would fall in and he'd have to get a new phone. I was looking around and saw reviews for this bluetooth speaker and saw that it was also splashproof with a suction cup and thought it was perfect. It came on time and exactly as described. He loves it and uses the suction cup in the shower. The suction seems pretty good and the sound quality it great too. Would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: love the speaker but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I'm not tech-savvy + I don't use this speaker much, but when I do it's a great experience. The battery life is great, it's waterproof (dropped into a tub :/ ), and its sound quality is on point. The only thing I have an issue with is the suction. I've tried putting it on multiple surfaces to see what works and what doesn't but this thing does not stick (hence why it dropped into a tub). I would give it a full 5/5 if the suction cup was better. I would recommend this speaker to anyone who wants a good speaker & isn't planning on sticking it to a wall/vertical surface :)
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Volume up = next song ... no good
customer_reviews.text: Update: I left a 3 star review originally, after experiencing technical difficulties, but good sound quality. Since then, the company has reached out and sent me a new, more updated version of my current speaker! I love it. Sound quality still great, Very durable and much easier to use. Thank you!!!! Update to 5 stars! Very difficult to use ... try to turn up the volum and it nexts the song! I continued to try and was unable to figure out how to turn it up without switching songs ... quality was good. Doesn’t get as loud as my other waterproof portable speaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge after 2 years **Replaced**
customer_reviews.text: I bought the speaker in 2017 and it is now 2019 and it doesn’t charge anymore. It works, but I can’t charge it. Update on 8/12/2019: They sent me a replacement that doesn't have the same manufacture defect. The charging port is now lined up with the outer lining on the speaker. I only wish they would have asked me before they sent it because I had just moved, but luckily back to the address that I originally purchased it from.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Was amazing....didn't last though. BUT, VicTsing CAME THROUGH!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a five star rating at first. After 16 months, the back/volume button doesn't work anymore. 2 stars now. Bummed. It was a solid speaker up till now. ** UPDATE APRIL 2018 ** VicTsing reached out after my most recent review and replaced the defective speaker! What great customer service! Not too many companies stand by their product like that. Very impressed with the service and for making correcting the issue. New speaker works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Järvinen

customer_reviews.title: This speaker lasted FOUR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a new one of these because this one that I bought FOUR YEARS ago got dropped one too many times. And by one too many, no exaggeration, I have probably dropped this thing 75-100 times in the last 4 years. I’d say once or twice a month that I’ve dropped it is a conservative estimate. Great little speaker. Sticking with it for my new one!
customer_reviews.author: Beffett

customer_reviews.title: great company..
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice for the one day it worked...The second day outside door bell did not ring the inside receiver..very disappointed..I need a door bell from the location of my front door...will not buy this product again.......I sent this product back ..they sent me another one it worked perfectly..I am glad that they stand behind their product..i love this doorbell so I changed the stars to excellent...
customer_reviews.author: sharona

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor. Product lasted six months and no warranty listed in product description.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker was decent while it lasted, but it only lasted about 6 months. I should have looked at the warranty information before purchasing this item and I suggest future buyers do so before purchasing. I sent a message to the seller in the hope that they will replace or refund the item. If not, I'm going to try the. It's a similar product at a similar (actually slightly lower) price point with a 1 year manufacture warranty included in the product description. Update 9/14/16- I'm adding a star because the seller responded promptly and sent a replacement (as opposed to a refund). Hopefully this one will last more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: K_Breri

customer_reviews.title: Genius Idea for a Classroom Attention Getter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first grade classroom. Listened to all of the patterns and set my selection. (The only time it is ineffective is on a full moon when the kids are INCREDIBLY LOUD.) Otherwise it is a gem at getting them quiet. I wish I could turn it up a bit more though.
customer_reviews.author: Happicat

customer_reviews.title: Doorbell is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bell. When I got it to replace one that only lasted 6 Mo., my wife was ill and in bed. I used the unit as a call alarm, if she needed something. Worked wonderfully. Now it is installed and working fine. One tiny issue I had is that the prongs on the alarm part were not sized to allow the unit to stay in place in a wall outlet, it would fall out. I had to take a pliers and widen the prongs (very carefully) and not it stays just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zak

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: I love having this door bell. If you have kids it's good for when they sleep. The sounds aren't so loud that they will wake the baby, but they are loud enough to hear throughout the house. There are several different tones to choose from. My son installed it and programmed it in less than 10 minutes. If you are in an apartment this would be great as well as your house.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Volume buttons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to listen to music on the golf course and he loves it! It sticks to the glass for easy use. The only thing that bugs me is that the buttons for what you think to be the volume buttons are the forward and back buttons. No way of controlling the volume manually on the devise, only through your phone. What that said... we bought another one for my brother in law! If I was going to get me one... it would have volume buttons. :)
customer_reviews.author: Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed. -- EDIT
customer_reviews.text: I was originally really excited by this product when I bought it three months ago. I was loud and worked well but a few days ago it just stopped being able to hold a charge. I've tried multiple different cables and it won't charge. Super disappointed. -- EDIT: I was contacted shortly after creating this review and the customer service was wonderful. They sent me a new one after trying to troubleshoot it with me. Changing my review to 5 stars. Thanks VicTsing!
customer_reviews.author: Liz D.

customer_reviews.title: small but strong construction and sound
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this when I'm getting ready in the morning. I'll keep my computer in the next room over and bring the speaker into the bathroom, signal stays clear and the sound is good. I've accidentally dropped it 2-3 times from about 5 feet onto bathroom tile, and it seems to be fine. My one complaint is that the volume buttons don't communicate with whatever bluetooth device I have it connected to, so if I want to adjust volume I have to get up and go over to the computer. Not a big deal for me, but it might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsey, but replaced with new unit.
customer_reviews.text: The clip broke on the face of the transmittter broke upon installation. Very cheaply made. Item returned. Update: The vendor contacted me after this review and replaced the faulty unit at no cost. The replacement works perfectly. No complaints. It earns 4 stars not 5 only because of the hassle returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy!
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell that came with our house wore out. I decided to give this inexpensive wireless doorbell a chance. WOW! It couldn't be easier to install and it has a mind-boggling number of tones to pick from, including the traditional ding-dong. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sage

customer_reviews.title: The doorbell works great. It was easy to install and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell works great. It was easy to install and easy to select a tune. However, I tried to change the tune but had a problem reprogramming it. The doorbell reverted back to the original tune I selected. It appears that the doorbell cannot be reprogrammed. Regardless of this, I am satisfied because I now have a working doorbell which was purchased at a reasonable price. UPDATE: Customer Service contacted me regarding the issue I previously posted (above). They replaced the defective doorbell at no additional cost. The doorbell works great and can be reprogrammed to any tune selected! Thank you - Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great, pairs easily
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker in my shower for several months. It sounds great, pairs easily, and is virtually indestructible (I use the suction cup feature and it falls occasionally from about 6 feet up). Also great for scaring your girlfriend when she is in the bathroom and does not expect Chumbawamba's "Tubthumping" to start blasting while she is trying to use the toilet. It also uses the same charger as a PS4 controller which is convenient since I like to listen to Chumbawamba while gaming for that extra motivation to prevail. I have noticed the battery charge dwindling slightly but for the price, I would gladly purchase another when this one gets knocked down and doesn't get up again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good investment for music lovers
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! I bought a couple before finding this one and it is by far the best...I've never submerged it just to test it like others, but I have dropped it in the shower and picked it back up quickly and it still plays amazingly. It's nice and loud, even has a nice amount of bass to it. It even sounds really good talking on it in the shower, from both ends. I would definitly recommend to others. They also have newer models out now, so those may be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: 5w speaker maybe no, not too loud not too low just fair
customer_reviews.text: build quality - good build-in battery runs around 2.5hrs when full volume suction and clip was ok controls - top part= volume down, volume up , bottom part is power and play/pause and pairing Sound Quality - is good on certain music even on full volume but when its really bassy music the speaker have distortion but for the price its worth it...don't compare it with JBL clip or altec lansing orbit... Conclusion... 1.cheap price 2.only bluetooth connectivity no aux-in 3.nice on shower good for people that looking for a cheap price speaker but reliable even on cold and rainy weather...
customer_reviews.author: badz

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 min to install this door bell and find a right sound. Will see how It will survive Alaskan spring with snow, rain and cold. I will update my review in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska5

customer_reviews.title: One great speaker for the money!
customer_reviews.text: -UPDATED- Ordered one speaker who did not hold the quality promised, however the company contacted me right away and went over and beyond with there customer service! They ended up getting me a new speaker, even a updated model and it workes great, the sound is really amazing from such a compact device. But again more so impressed with the custumer service, So big shout out to the guys who work there support line. --------------------------------------------------------------- Did only last me little over a month, hardly got to break in the speaker before it started acting up. Was really happy with it in the begining, but did not take many usages before the sound got all distorted. Now its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr groger

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars if......
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is loud and water proof, super easy to sync and operate.... the thing that ruined this great product for me was the fact it doesn't hold a charge. So this speaker can be charging all day... and if you unplug it, and start using it 5 minutes into it...a notification sound beeps that it needs to be charged. I do still use it, just plugged up but at this point why have the waterproof feature, if it's just going to sit on my bathroom mirror wasting plug space... I wouldn't recommend this product. Now if it charged, and held the charge... it would 4-5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Soares

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an inexpensive speaker for my shower. The sound was good for the size and price. It was easy to pair with my Ipod. On the negative side, the volume control and forward/backward buttons are right next to each other and I find it virtually impossible to turn the volume up or down without skipping to the next song or backing up. It seemed to go for quite a number of uses before it needed recharging.
customer_reviews.author: K-Angel.

customer_reviews.title: Wont hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold a charge and no indulicater letting you know how much charge is left. Its very difficult to turn on and off. It tells you outloud when you turn it on and off which is very annoying. Way too complicated for a simple device. Update: The seller reached out and sent a new one which holds a charge so far. They work real hard to please. I couldn't give 5 stars just because the functionality of the device is still not as good as it could be but the company is awesone.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was always worried about having my bluetooth speaker in the bathroom due to the humidity. This is a must have in the shower to listen to music. Sound quality is not the best but that is to be expected from such a small speaker, but it does get pretty loud. Suction cup is very strong and does not fall off at all. Only downfall is the way to turn up the volume is by holding down the "next" button so there is no real way to just go up 1 notch in volume, but that may be me being picky. Overall, very happy with this purchse.
customer_reviews.author: DesertChild629

customer_reviews.title: Dont be a DING DONG....buy it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my winter home...already have on for summer cabin. I installed an RCA jack so I can amplify it for Halloween. When the lil buggers push the button, they will have a large dog barking in their ear. HA. All of the tones and sounds are great. Works at great distance and easy to set up. Great doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Samplerman

customer_reviews.title: My door bell is rung from the kitchen - by ...
customer_reviews.text: My door bell is rung from the kitchen - by my wife - to my home-office. When she wants me to come to dinner, she does not have to yell for me, she just pushes the button once, and I go running to the kitchen. The wife just loves the simplicity of it all. It works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This doorbell works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this doorbell. It was easy to plug in, easy to adhere to the wall outside my apartment (which is not out of doors), and the ring is easily heard. I only use the regular doorbell sound and it works. I think it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanamo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this speaker. Carabiner broke first use. Used on a floating trip to the river and it worked fine. Battery life when fully charged has only ever given me about 3-4hours of playtime. Used at the beach and got wet and never worked again after that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: About what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the speaker so i could listen to music in the shower without ruining my phone. I'm able to scroll through songs, and the sound quality is better than I expected. My only complaint is that the volume button doesn't work. The volume button and song select buttons are kind of combined and every time I try to pick the volume, it skips to the next song. That being said, I can still adjust the volume with my phone, it just isn't ideal. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Bretvick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It's louder than what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's louder than what I was expecting, and easy to setup. Just make sure that you set your chime first before you mount the remote. In order to set your ring tone you'll need to press the remote button while pressing the other button on the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. The location of the controls is a bit difficult to deal with in the shower (all located on the side of the unit) but they work well. Once you have learned where they are and how they operate, you will be pleased with this little power box of a speaker. And doesn't everything sound better in the shower? My tryout for the Voice will take place in my shower - viewer discretion advised!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pairing with my laptops, replacement sent
customer_reviews.text: This review is edited. Initially the speaker paired fine with my laptops and smartphone, but my laptops stopped being able to detect the speaker. The company, without being asked, sent me a replacement speaker that pairs just fine. The speaker is loud enough. I would suggest longer charging cord. Also, the "power on" announcement and auto turn off if not paired are loud and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Weather-proof, wireless, and easy to use. Great for both indoor and outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with good sound quality. It's especially good for outdoor use because it's wireless, durable, water-resistant, and allows you to mount (with suction cup), hang, or simply lay it on almost any surface. I use the mini-caribeener to attach it to my pack when I hit the trails, or hang it in my tent/canopy/etc. after setting up camp. Keeps it out of the way of spills, being sat on or stepped on, getting knocked over, etc. I definitely recommend it to anyone, especially folks who spend a lot of time outdoors and want an easy way to keep the music going!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker with nice sound. Easy to sync & easy to use. Comes with suction cup & a carabiner which I use to hang on a wire shelf I have in bathroom. Got it at a great price as it was on Today's Deals on Amazon. This will be great to take places since it's so compact. We own another wireless waterproof speaker that I paid $40 for that is quite a bit larger that we use out by our pool in the summer & the sound is only slightly better than this little speaker. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life sucks and it will die while it's plugged in. I like my music loud so I play this thing at max volume, and it'll last 30-45 minutes on a full charge. I use my cellphones wall charger and this speaker will still die if played at max volume. I have to reduce the volume to about 50% for it to stay on while charging. This is a small speaker, so 50% isnt loud enough for me while I have blow dryer or water water going. This is my only complaint about this speaker. Battery life. Speaker is loud enough at 100% volume and water resistant when placed in the shower but battery life is a buzzkill.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simply mount to where you want visitors to announce they've arrived. Uses 2 small screws. Anchors included in package if you need them. Plug the main unit into an available wall socket, select the chime you want, set the loudness and you're done! Lots of different ringtones to choose from. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SDCrosstrek

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when I first got it and it still works great if it's charged, the problem is it doesn't hold a charge very long now. I got it less than a year ago (10 months) and it dies after a few days. I only listen to it in the mornings while getting ready, maybe 30 min? Constantly having to charge it has me looking for a replacement already unfortunately. Update: Was sent a new speaker to make up for the battery issue outlined above. Will update again in 10 months and see if this battery lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but having the volume buttons also act as song changers causes constant issues, and it doesn’t get very loud. Tough to hear over the shower, which was the entire point of ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality wasn't great.. I had the speaker next to me ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW 7/29/17 - After I returned this product, their customer service team reached out to me to send me a replacement. The extra star is for their outstanding customer service, speedy shipping time and want to make things right. Thank you VicTsing! Bought this for camping and river floating. The sound quality wasn't great..I had the speaker next to me and the person 3 feet away from me couldn't really hear it. The carabineer instantly broke, the suction cup didn't work well and the volume buttons only skipped the song back or forward. Returned after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Was nice before it stopped owrking
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the speaker feels middle-of-the-road. Not flimsy, but could be firmer to give confidence. Sound is good, but a little muffled/bassy, but im sure thats due to the water resistant nature, so no complaints there. Speaker unfortunately stopped charging, and stopped turning on all together. Wish there was some kind of warranty. I am going to try a different manufacturer for a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This things bluetooth connects better than my $200 Vizio TV soundbar. It's got buttons that allow you to move to the next track, and even answer calls. The speaker is perfect for my shower. It's still on the charge 8 days ago. (I only listen to it during my shower). The suction cup doesn't do anything but the clip works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the money- and it's actually pretty waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a couple of years ago. It worked beautifully but eventually died. Not from water infiltration but because it fell several times. I got less than 4 months out of my second unit and when I posted a bad review they immediately sent me another free of charge. It's working beautifully. I recommend this product and will buy another when this one dies in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Henry B.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this little speaker to bring with me kayaking ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little speaker to bring with me kayaking and back packing. During one of the first times using the speaker I rolled in my kayak. The speaker what completely submerged in water for 3-5 minutes. Although it's water proof I assumed that the speaker was done for. To my surprise it continued working without issue. Since then it's traveled with me on numerous water, hiking, and snowboarding trips. Nothing seems to faze the audio quality. I should also mention that it has a extremely long battery life. I usually charge it the day before a trip and it will last the entire weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: last for a good amount of time so long as it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, last for a good amount of time so long as it is not maxed out. Bought this with a little bit of hesitation because there were no reviews of it that demonstrated its ability to work in the shower. After using it, I can confidentially say it does and the audio level is pretty good. My one gripe is that the flap that covers that charger seems very insufficient. It is just a little rubber flap with no gasket and could easily be accidentally moved when pushing buttons in the shower. I have been very mindful of that and have not had a problem. At the price (~ $16), I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small by-the-door space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we need, and I enjoy the volume settings since our receiver had to be plugged into an outlet all the way in the kitchen. It's small and compact and doesn't draw any unnecessary attention, and it fit in the awkward spot by the door where the previous door bell was. Was considering a second one as an "intercom" of sorts for the second floor.
customer_reviews.author: Hikaru Yuy

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for about a year now. I think it has great sound, plenty of volume for the shower or a room and the charge seems to last forever! This speaker is usually hanging in my shower and gets a couple of hours use each weekend. It can go months without needing charging. It always pairs automatically to my phone once powered on. Last spring I took it on a cruise, and it was quite nice as a speaker for in our cabin, also. It also does a nice job of not blaring out phone notifications while I'm listening. I'm buying another for my teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible volume. I can barely hear my music over the shower water. My phone works better on the shelf near shower than this speaker does inside the shower. Suction does not hold at all to side of shower. You have to put it on a flat surface. Spend a few more bucks and buy a better quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: ericaca

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancé for Christmas because he likes to listen to music while he’s in the shower but I was concerned about his phone getting ruined by the steam. I don’t have to worry anymore with this thing! He loves it and he says it works even better than his phone speakers do. He listens to it in the shower, takes it backpacking with him and takes it outside when he’s working on the car. He takes it anywhere for all of his listening needs. It’s durable and the sound quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Summer wright

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Paired easily with Moto X phone as well as iPad 2. Only talks to one at a time and, so far, I've had to disconnect it from one before it will connect with the other. I hung it in the shower and enjoyed listening to a book while showering. I've also used it in my car to talk on the phone. Stuck it to the window by my head for easy hearing in a sort of noisy car. Person on the phone could hear me ok. The 1 star discount is because the "power on" announcement is really loud and turning the volume down doesn't seem to make a difference in the announcement volume.
customer_reviews.author: Abbasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell, Super Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Really nice doorbell with a great doorbell sound. What I love most about it is there is zero installation involved. Plug the doorbell ringer into the socket. Press the already taped doorbell button outside your door and it's ready. In less than a minute it's up and running.I can't believe I didn't get one of these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to some
customer_reviews.text: Durable no doubt waterproof slightly tested in rain occasionally but never submerged always works without issue. But I am disappointed with the volume, as a heavy equipment operator most machines overpower this speaker, even biking with little to no traffic it’s a struggle it hear. I would recommend for indoor use close quarters for sure under $20 but for that price and above many better other options that a lanyard or suction cup can be added to n be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker, but we never get even close to 6 hour of playback time. Seems like after 4-5 showers we have to charge again. My daughter’s showers are about 25 min (she’s a teen), but mine are only about 8-10min per shower. We should get longer out of the battery than that. And it used to have a low battery warning, but now it just shuts off in the middle of playing. Oh well, it wasn’t too expensive. I would probably still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth speaker for your shower (but not, if the documentation is to be believed, for your pool). It has a nice form factor, a suction cup, and an included small carabiner. Pros: Great form factor Nice long battery Excellent volume and clarity (make sure you turn your phone volume up too) Carabiner is a nice backup for the suction cup. Cons: Difficult, sometimes, to change the volume, because it requires holding down the button that also controls fast forwarding. Volume button only changes the speakers volume, not the device's volume. As a result you have to consider two separate volume settings. The Suction cup doesn't stay affixed for very long.
customer_reviews.author: anik

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless doorbell kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was very simple to set up, t has a lot of bell variations to choose from, and it has a few different volume levels. The highest is not quite as high as I'd like it so am looking for a more central place to plug in the ringer portion. But overall a great wireless doorbell kit!
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Youngster

customer_reviews.title: Was happy but eventually sad
customer_reviews.text: This was loud and nice sounding but it stopped pairing occasionally which was frustrating, then the battery life fell short then by the second month it stopped pairing all together, you know when a product just wants to be good but missing that little extra something .....
customer_reviews.author: Straight

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great for the past year, but quickly dying
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker just under a year ago, and for most of the time it's been great. Unfortunately, over the past few months, I started noticing that the volume wasnt as loud as it used to be, and the charges weren't lasting as long. At this point, I get to use it for 4 or 5 showers (less than an hour of playing time) before needing to recharge (granted, that's at max volume). For what it is, it's a great value, but I might invest in something longer-lasting next time to avoid having to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Stonediggity

customer_reviews.title: Small unit is perfect for wall sockets.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the actual doorbell that plugs into the wall is so small. My last one took up 2 plugs; this one just the one. My only complaint is I do wish it was a little louder but even that doesn’t take away from the review.
customer_reviews.author: hicksj74

customer_reviews.title: Speaker works great. Connects to phone through bluetooth fast
customer_reviews.text: Speaker works great. Connects to phone through bluetooth fast. suctions well to shower tile. Volume is good for a bathroom. Battery seems to last a long time. Cons are that you have to hold the button down for a long time to turn on and off, and the volume is only controlled through your device. There are no volume controls on the actual speaker. So if you are using it in the shower and you don't have your device in the shower with you, you will not be able to control the volume. You can skip songs though which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little device
customer_reviews.text: It has a large auction cup that has kept it housed on the wall of my shower for 2 weeks now. It also comes with a clip in case you want to hang it up. Battery life is awesome so far. I use it for about 20 minutes each iteration and I have only charged it out of the box. The buttons are easy to use and navigate. It has a voice prompt that tells you the device is on or off and a notification tone that tells you it's connected to Bluetooth. Pairing is simple. I have taken one call through the device and it worked quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great for the price. I’m have brought it to the beach, use it in the bathroom and have it on during baths. It absolutely is what I was looking for! I do not use wireless speakers that often so I wasn’t looking for Bose or Bowers and Wilkins quality. The only problem I have encountered is that I can’t quite figure out how to adjust the volume from the speaker rather than my phone. Every time I try turning the volume up, I accidentally change the song.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Disheva

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Just installed a security gate at the front entrance of our home. The electric gate is about 100 ft from our front door. Mounted the button on the outside of the gate facing the driveway and plugged in the receiver in our dining room. It can be heard all over the house when we have a visitor. Works great no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha L. Odor
